Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2009 06:13AM sues47 wrote: I am currently on AC chemo, I take Emend for the 3 days, first round I took Stemetil for nausea, not good...so onc put me on Maxolon for 2nd round (or known under Pramin as well ) which worked alot better.. On 3rd round took the Maxolon plus had a Ondansetron wafers ( tablet dissolves on tongue) pretty yuk to take, but really worked...nausea was then only minor and quite easy to manage.   So keep asking your specialists until they find something that works Good luck  Regards Sue
Posts.Title: Anyone take the Emend longer blondie45 TexasRose
